data.lyric:
[ti:That's How You Feel (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.75]That's How You Feel (Explicit) - Drake
[00:01.62]Producer：Noel
[00:01.95]Drake：
[00:02.66]Yeah woo
[00:10.06]I'm just in the cut sittin' sideways
[00:12.66]Way that you lookin' all the time
[00:15.58]Time gets to tickin' and it takes a toll
[00:18.42]Told you I couldn't really draw the line
[00:21.18]Line ringin' sayin' that you told him things
[00:24.18]Things that you could've kept inside
[00:26.79]Sidetrackin' me when I was good to you
[00:29.54]You were somebody I would stand behind
[00:33.01]I know you like to drink 'til the sun up
[00:35.20]Grind 'til you come up
[00:36.60]Work all winter shine all summer
[00:39.48]Ride for your brother
[00:40.78]You die for your mother
[00:42.18]Keep that sh*t a hunna
[00:43.58]I know you wanna
[00:45.01]Vacay to a place where you could
[00:48.02]Take pictures post on Insta
[00:50.56]Your friends say they miss ya
[00:52.04]But they don't really miss ya
[00:53.52]Nicki Minaj/DJ Boof：
[00:56.48]Rule number one to be a boss a** b**ch uh huh
[00:59.29]Never let a clown n**ga try to play you okay
[01:01.91]If he play you then rule number two okay
[01:04.61]Is f**k his best friends and make 'em yes men okay
[01:07.48]A
[01:09.45]Wow that's how you feel
[01:13.73]Drake：
[01:17.48]I'm just in the cut sittin' sideways
[01:20.11]Way that you lookin' all the time
[01:23.01]Time it done left you with a broken heart
[01:25.83]Hardly excuses how you play with mine
[01:28.64]Mindin' my business and you show up
[01:31.46]Up to no good I should've seen the signs
[01:34.19]Signin' me up to do your dirty work
[01:36.97]Workin' to try to get you off my mind
[01:40.35]I know you like to drink 'til the sun up
[01:42.60]Grind 'til you come up
[01:43.90]Work all winter shine all summer
[01:46.76]Ride for your brother
[01:48.13]You die for your mother
[01:49.52]Keep that sh*t a hunna
[01:50.94]I know you wanna
[01:52.26]Vacay to a place where you could
[01:55.63]Take pictures post on Insta
[01:57.91]Your friends say they miss ya
[01:59.35]But they don't really miss ya
[02:00.89]Nicki Minaj/DJ Boof：
[02:03.47]What the f**k this ain't Chanel n**ga
[02:05.04]Custom down
[02:06.26]What the f**k I ain't smokin' hot
[02:07.90]Bust me down
[02:09.09]You the same clown n**ga that was runnin' me down
[02:11.87]Now you all up in my 'cause you wanna be down
[02:14.48]Okay
[02:16.82]Wow that's how you feel
[02:19.03]That's how you feel
[02:19.76]That's how you feel
data.trans:
[ti:That's How You Feel (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.75]//
[00:01.62]//
[00:01.95]//
[00:02.66]//
[00:10.06]我把车停在路边
[00:12.66]就像你一直以来的模样
[00:15.58]时间嘀嘀哒哒不停歇 时不时地敲响警钟
[00:18.42]跟你说过了 我真的没办法画个底线
[00:21.18]电话响起 你给他说了什么事
[00:24.18]那些事情你没法憋在心里
[00:26.79]我对你好的时候 你总是顾左右而言他
[00:29.54]我愿意站在你身后支持你
[00:33.01]我知道你喜欢喝酒喝到天亮
[00:35.20]喜欢卖命工作
[00:36.60]工作一个冬天 享受一个夏天
[00:39.48]为你的兄弟日夜奔波
[00:40.78]为你的母亲 你愿意死
[00:42.18]保持百分百的热情
[00:43.58]我知道你想
[00:45.01]出去度个假
[00:48.02]想拍拍照片 发到Instagram上
[00:50.56]你的朋友说他们想你了
[00:52.04]但他们并不是真的想你
[00:53.52]//
[00:56.48]规则一 要做个最棒的女人
[00:59.29]绝对别让小丑一样的家伙玩弄你
[01:01.91]如果他敢玩弄你 那就规则二
[01:04.61]去搞他最好的朋友 让他们自相残杀
[01:07.48]//
[01:09.45]你现在就是这种感觉
[01:13.73]//
[01:17.48]我把车停在路边
[01:20.11]就像你一直以来的模样
[01:23.01]时间留给你的是一颗破碎的心
[01:25.83]但那不能成为你玩弄我的借口
[01:28.64]我忙忙碌碌干着活 然后你出现了
[01:31.46]你的出现根本就不是好事 我早该明白的
[01:34.19]你让我帮你做着恶心的事
[01:36.97]我努力想把你赶出我的脑海
[01:40.35]我知道你喜欢喝酒喝到天亮
[01:42.60]喜欢卖命工作
[01:43.90]工作一个冬天 享受一个夏天
[01:46.76]为你的兄弟日夜奔波
[01:48.13]为你的母亲 你愿意死
[01:49.52]保持百分百的热情
[01:50.94]我知道你想
[01:52.26]出去度个假
[01:55.63]想拍拍照片 发到Instagram上
[01:57.91]你的朋友说他们想你了
[01:59.35]但他们并不是真的想你
[02:00.89]//
[02:03.47]什么玩意儿 这不是香奈儿 哥们
[02:05.04]没有定做的衣服了吗
[02:06.26]什么玩意儿 我没有抽那玩意儿
[02:07.90]想逮捕我吗
[02:09.09]你还是那个小丑 想搞垮我的小丑
[02:11.87]现在你们都在我面前 因为你们都想和我做朋友
[02:14.48]好的
[02:16.82]你现在就是这种感觉
[02:19.03]你现在就是这种感觉
[02:19.76]你现在就是这种感觉
